abilities.title: Knowledge & Abilities of the Half Wizard
abilities.description:
1. Common Knowledge Spells: Knows Decipher Magic, Sense Magic, Sleep, Globe of Daylight, Tongues; Enchanted Cauldron not learned.
2. Additional Spells: Starts with spells based on prior training (roll or pick):
  - 01-10% Novice: 1D6+5 Level 1 Wizard spells.
  - 11-20% Beginner: 1D4+2 Level 1, 1D4+2 Level 2.
  - 21-30% Apprentice: 1D6+1 Level 1, 2 Level 2, 2 Level 3.
  - 31-40% Talented Apprentice: 1D6+1 Level 1, 1D6 Level 2, 1D4 Level 3.
  - 41-50% Adept: 1D4+1 Level 1, 1D4+2 Level 2, 1D4+1 Level 3, 2 Level 4.
  - 51-60% Natural: 1D4+3 Level 1, 1D4+2 Level 2, 1D4+2 Level 3, 2 Level 4, 1 Level 5.
  - 61-70% Prodigy: 1D4 Level 1, 1D4+2 Level 2, 1D4+3 Level 3, 1D4+1 Level 4, 1D4 Level 5, 1 Level 6.
  - 71-80% Spy/Stealth: 1D6+8 spells (Levels 1-4, stealth-focused).
  - 81-90% Protector/Defense: 1D6+8 spells (Levels 1-4, protection-focused).
  - 91-00% Combat/Offensive: 1D6+8 spells (Levels 1-4, combat-focused).
  Note: Spells cast as 1st-level Wizard.
3. Learning New Spells: Possible (knows basics/scroll conversion), but uninterested.
4. Enchanted Cauldron: Not known, not pursued.
5. See and Use Ley Lines: Sees ley lines/nexuses, draws P.P.E., enhances spells; detects energy from powerful beings/items (e.g., dragons, gods, Greater Rune Weapons).
6. Ley Line Rejuvenation: On ley line/nexus, doubles healing rate; instant rejuvenation (1x/24 hr, 10 min concentration, restores 2D6 HP/S.D.C., no P.P.E. cost); P.P.E. recovery normal.
7. Special Wizard O.C.C. Skills & Abilities:
  - Half Wizards & Armor: Prefers leather, studded leather, magic armor; metal armor penalties as Wizard (-15% prowl, -20% climb/swim in splint/plate; -10% chain/scale; -5% studded leather; no penalties leather/padded; +20% P.P.E. cost if >50% metal, roll penalties).
  - Circles & Symbols: Reads scrolls, runes, recognizes wards/circles, knows 12 basic magic symbols, 4 Elemental symbols, symbolic colors, 4 power words (Acba, Keron, Pein, Yin).
  - Conversion of Spell Scrolls: As Wizard, but half success ratio; doesn’t attempt.
  - Magic Guilds: Cannot join formal guilds; may join cults/secret societies (uninterested).
  - Recognize Enchantment: Identifies mind control, curses, magic effects (not illusions/psionics); 20%+5%/level.
  - Recognize Magic: Spots magic items (15%+5%/level); doesn’t know powers/use.
  - Teach Spells: Can teach spells to Forsaken Mages/apprentices with caution.
8. Magic Bonuses: +1 vs magic at 3, 6, 9, 12, 15 (non-magical occupation levels); +3 vs horror factor (may stack). Spell Strength: 12 (fixed).
9. P.P.E.: 2D4x10+10 + P.E. + 2D4+1/level (non-magical occupation, 2nd+); draws from ley lines, nexuses, amulets, others, blood sacrifices.
